sourcesContent:
<template>
  <TopBar :showBackButton="showBackButton" :title="barTitle"/>
  <router-view v-slot="{ Component, route }">
    <transition :name="route.meta.transition">
      <component :is="Component" />
    </transition>
  </router-view>
</template>

<script>
import TopBar from './components/ui/TopBar.vue';
import store from "./stores/store.js";
import { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';
import { useAppState } from './stores/appState.js';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    TopBar,
  },
  props: {
  },
  setup() {
    const AppState = useAppState(store);
    const { title, isAtHomeView } = storeToRefs(AppState);
    const barTitle = title;
    const showBackButton = !isAtHomeView;
    return {
      barTitle,
      showBackButton
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
    }
  }
}

</script>

<style>
  .slide-left-enter-active {
    transition: all 0.3s ease-out;
  }
  .slide-left-enter-from,
  .slide-left-leave-to {
    transform: translateX(2em);
    opacity: 0;
  }

</style>
